name: EFreeGames
short: Track and notify about free games from various platforms
description: Tracks free games from Steam, Epic Games, GOG and other platforms. Sends notifications to a specified channel when new free games are available.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data about users.
install_msg: Thanks for installing EFreeGames! Use `[p]help efreegames` to see all commands.
author: YourName
